column1: * AWS Pricing Calculator provides only an estimate of your AWS fees and doesn't include any taxes that might apply. Your actual fees depend on a variety of factors, including your actual usage of AWS services.

To make the system adapt higher demand, I increase the capacity of Cloudfront, S3, RDS with more nodes for redundancy. Besides, I use more instances of EC2 at average 10 instances On-Demand, because at peak time  it can be 12 after scaling, and reduce to 8 at night time
